document.masterDocTitle: Description of Marolia alicantina sp. nov. (Coleoptera: Melandryidae) from Spain and new distribution records of Marolia species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Description of Marolia alicantina sp. nov. (Coleoptera: Melandryidae) from Spain and new distribution records of Marolia species

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Kúty 1959, CZ- 76001 Zlín, Czech Republic. brouk. vsetin @ centrum. cz; https: // orcid. org / 0000 - 0002 - 4300 - 1869

bibRefCitation.author: Maran, J.
bibRefCitation.refString: Maran, J. (1933) Beitrag zur Kenntnis der Gattung Marolia Muls. mit der Beschreibung einer neuen Species (Col. Serropalpidae). Entomologisches Nachrichtenblatt, VII (3), 110 - 113.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material examined. SYNTYPES ( 6 spec. ): 1 ♀ , ‘Bosn. Herzeg. / Ivan. / Reitter [p, w] // TYPUS [p, r] // Marolia / Purkyněi M. [h] / Dr. Mařan det. [p, w]’ ( NMPC ); 1 ♀ , ‘Bosn. Herzeg. / Ivan. / Reitter [p, w] // TYPUS [p, r] // Marolia / Purkyněi / M. [h] / Dr. Mařan det. [p, w]’ ( NMPC ); 1 ♀ , ‘ Herzegowina / Reitter [text in black frame] [p, w] // TYPUS [p, r] // Marolia / Purkyněi / M. [h] / Dr. Mařan det. [p, w]’ ( NMPC ); 1 spec. , ‘Šarlir [= ШаралИЯ = Sharaliya] Pirin / Mac. VII.32 / Mař. et Táb. [J. Mařan et K. Táborský] [p, w] // Marolia Purkyněi / přechod k / ab. obscura / M. [h] / Dr. Mařan det. [p, w]’ ( NMPC ); 1 spec. , ‘Muntelui / Bihar, Rom. [ Bihor , Romania ] / Mařan et Táb. [J. Mařan et K. Táborský] [p, w] // TYPUS [p, r] // Marolia / Purkyněi M. / ab. obscura M. [h] / Dr. Mařan det. [p, w]’ ( NMPC ). All specimens were provided with an additional red printed label: ‘
Marolia
/
purkynei Mařan, 1933
/
SYNTYPE
/ Ondřej Konvička & / Hervé Brustel labeled 2020’. Note: Location of the last specimen of type series is unknown.

Additional material examined.
BULGARIA :
Rodopi Mts ,
15.vii.1987
, I. Kovář lgt., J. Jelínek det., O. Konvička revid., 1 spec. ( NMPC )
;

, K. Orszulik lgt., O. Konvička det., 1 spec. ( OKZC )
;

1500 m a.s.l.
, [ca. 42°47′N , 25°58′E ],

, T. Růžička lgt. et det., 4 spec. ( MNHT , JVOC , OKZC , PZPC , VNPC )
;

19. –20.vi.2007

,
same data, T. Kopecký lgt., O. Konvička det., 1 spec. ( TKJC )
;

6.–8.v.2009

,
same data, F. Pavel lgt., O. Konvička det., 1 spec. ( FPVC )
;

11.vi.2017

;

,

‘ Hermannstadt [= Sibiu ], H. Riñe [= Păltiniș ],
VII.1932
, Dr. E. Worell’ lgt., O. Konvička det., 2 spec. ( NMPC )
.

Distribution. Bosnia and Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Macedonia , Romania , Serbia and Montenegro ( Nikitsky & Pollock 2008 ), also recorded from Albania ( Kovács et al. 2012 ). The first specific record for Montenegro was published by Konvička (2015) . First records for Croatia and Greece .
